Division File No NHAI/12011/16/2004 Admn:) Sub: Air Travel Permission for DGM / Manager Level Officers It has been decided to extend the facility of air travel on official duty to DGM Level officers. The Manager level officers may also be allowed to travel by air on official tours provided that the distance involved in the journey is more than 500 km and journey cannot be performed overnight (6PM to 8AM, next morning) or time involved in the journey is more than 14 hours. The controlling officer should satisfy himselflherself that the tour is essential and is in the interest of work, while approving the tour programme It is clarified that the facility is not available for the purpose of LTC_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 4/" (V_ K Sharma) General Manager (Admn:) To AII Officers in the HQs AII PIUs/CMUs S4uM NHAL
